front.title: The Aggregation MIB for time based samples of a Managed Object

abstract.t: This memo defines a portion of the Management Information Base (MIB) for use with network management protocols in the Internet community. In particular, it is used to configure an agent to aggregate values of a (user) specified MO instance sampled at (user) specified intervals for a (user) specified number of times and to service queries related to the aggregated MOs.
